title: Illusionist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may cast an Illusion on a Coven member at night to make them appear innocent.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your Illusioned target will appear as a random Town role to all Investigatives.
- Your Illusions will make your target not appear as an attacking role.
- Illusioning is astral.
- With the Necronomicon, you may deal a Basic Attack to your target instead of casting an Illusion, unless they are a Coven member.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven.

desc:
Post 3856
*It's literally just 'your target appears innocent' and 'your target is astral.'*
